name: aztec
description: multi bot with rich features made by Vorterx team

PREFIX.description: Prefix of your bot Ex: . , / , # , & etc. Put anythong except @ (Default is .)

BOTNAME.description: Put your bot name here as its required.

SESSION_ID.description: A random string for your bot session. Which works as an OTP to get qr code. You have to change session every time to get a new qr.

MODS.description: Put any phone number without + , () and spaces "," Ex: 27686881509 )

MONGODB.description: Mongodb Url is required add mongoUrl.
